title: Leaver Buster is Busted!
body:
Hey fellow summoners haha,

Okay, so I left 2 bot games because I had to go. And, therefore, the leaver buster kicked in. I understand that, I am willing to put up with the punishment, having to wait for 10 minutes is fine. 
So, I've been meaning to play for a while, and I have queued with friends over and over. We wait 10 minutes, but every time the timer reaches 0, despite no one leaving queue or anything, the timer begins yet again. It occurs over and over. Not only this, but our timers do not match up. While my friends are on 5 minutes left, I have 8 minutes left!
It is so frustrating, please help me :(

Thanks in Advance
SuperAthleteRox (OCE)
{{champion:429}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:13}}

replies.body:
The leavebuster system currently has known bugs in it which match exactly what you've described. It should be fixed by next patch, which I think is next year.

In the mean time, just don't leave games!
